page.title: 08HEALTH
page.content: There are no hospitals in this area but most people go to Cleobury Mortimer Medical Centre or Tenbury Medical Centre for check-up,injections and for other things that crop-up. If you have broken a limb you are advised to go to Kidderminster General hospital. For operations you go to Kidderminster or if it is not very criticaL,Ludlow. People go to Tenbury,Ludlow,Bridgnorth or Kidderminster to be nursed. There is a district nurse who is based in Cleobury who would come round for check-ups. If you could not go to the surgery a doctor would come round and look at you.If necessary phone for an ambulance to take you to Kidderminster or Shrewsbury.
